DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age > 18 , urinary urgency ( least mild bother single item Urgency Scale ) , negative urine dipstick clean catch . : Urinary incontinence ( great mild Incontinence Severity Index ) , recent ( < 6week ) urinary tract infection , active recent ( < 3month ) nephrolithiasis , prior diagnosis congenital urinary tract abnormality , know neurological disorder ( multiple sclerosis , Parkinson 's , spina bifid , spinal cord injury ) , recent pregnancy < 3 month , prior sacral nerve stimulation Botox injection .
